name: Stuck (Snail Rhymer, Tom Rafferty)
description:
Day in, day out, you’re stuck in a loop.
And it’s not a fun one.
Can you get out?

(If you're particularly stuck at the traffic lights, hold the left mouse button to drive forwards.)

Controls: Mouse

A game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47, with the theme "Stuck in a Loop".
Ludum Dare submission page
